```{r}

source("R/run_mpa.R")
source("R/mpa_var_setup.R")

mrate_X = 0.5
mrate_P = 0.5
ncells=10
MPA_width=0
hx = 0
hp = 0
rx = 1
Kx = 100
ax = 0.03
c = 0.05
ay = 0.03
dp = 0.25
Kp = 25
X0 = 25
P0 = 25

pars <- c(mrate_X, mrate_P, ncells, MPA_width, hx, hp, rx, Kx, ax, c, ay, dp, Kp)
   
values <- c(X0, P0) 

variables <- vectors_fun(values = values, pars = pars)

t1 <- spatial_P_X (time = 50, MPA_width= 0, variables = variables)

plot(t1$popXsum, type="l")
plot(t1$popPsum, type="l")



```
